description: This table stores the types of changes made to the Outcome and Assessment Information Set (OASIS) data set.

columns.name: OASIS_SET_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the data set record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: OASIS_SNPSHT_CHNG_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Records whether a data set key-value pair was added, modified, or removed since the last time a snapshot was taken.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Removed


Added


Modified

columns.name: CHANGE_KEY
columns.description: The name of the key which uniquely identifies a data point in the data set. This is often the name of the XML node for a given value in an export file, but could vary depending on dataset

columns.name: CHANGE_VALUE
columns.description: The new value of the associated data set key as of this snapshot contact.
